AREA.name: Briartown Inn
AREA.short_description: short description of area
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the Briartown Inn. It is an older wooden building, but has a middle-age charm to it.

AREA.name: Briartown Town Square
AREA.short_description: You are standing in the town square of Briartown.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the town square of Briartown. The area is bustling with activity and is surrounded by a number of shops and other establishments.

AREA.name: Briartown Blacksmith
AREA.short_description: You are in the shop of the Briartown Blacksmith.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the shop of the Briartown Blacksmith. The blacksmith's shop is located in the southwest corner of town.

AREA.name: Briartown Armory
AREA.short_description: You are in the Briartown Armory.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the Briartown Armory. The shop isn't much to look at, but the wares are well made.

AREA.name: Briartown Park
AREA.short_description: You are in Briartown Park.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a small park on the eastern edge of town.

AREA.name: Behind Briartown Inn
AREA.short_description: You are in a dark alleyway behind Briartown Inn.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a dark alleyway behind the Briartown Inn.

AREA.name: Briartown Town Entrance
AREA.short_description: You are in the entrance to Briartown.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the entrance to the small but charming township of Briartown.

AREA.name: Briartown Guard Tower
AREA.short_description: You are in the Briartown Guard Tower.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the guard tower of Briartown.

AREA.name: Outside of Briartown
AREA.short_description: You are standing outside of Briartown.
AREA.long_description: You are standing at the gates of a small township called Briartown.

AREA.name: Path Through Farmland
AREA.short_description: You are on a path that cuts between pastures and fields.
AREA.long_description: You are standing on a path that cuts between pastures and fields. You can make out a town nearby.

AREA.name: Somerset Farm
AREA.short_description: You are at Somerset Farm.
AREA.long_description: You are standing at Somerset Farm, just off of the main path leading into town.

AREA.name: Path Through Fields
AREA.short_description: You are on a path leading through some fields.
AREA.long_description: You are on a path that leads through some fields. You notice the number of trees increasing toward the north.

AREA.name: Outside the Woods
AREA.short_description: You are on a path that leads into a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are on a path that leads into a densely wooded area.

AREA.name: Murky Woods Entrance
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.name: Ogre Hut
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a small hut in the woods.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a small hut in the woods.

AREA.name: Murky Woods 16
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.name: Murky Woods 18
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.name: Murky Woods 19
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.name: Murky Woods Exit
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a densely wooded area. You think you are on the path...

AREA.name: Outside a Cave
AREA.short_description: You are standing outside the entrance to a dark cave.
AREA.long_description: You are standing outside the entrance to a dark cave.

AREA.name: Cave Entrance
AREA.short_description: You are standing in the entrance of a dark cave.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in the entrance of a dark cave.

AREA.name: Bend in Cave
AREA.short_description: You are standing at a bend in the cave.
AREA.long_description: You are standing at a bend in the cave.

AREA.name: Narrow Ledge
AREA.short_description: You are standing on a narrow ledge across a wide crevice in the cave.
AREA.long_description: You are standing on a narrow ledge with your back up against the wall of the cave. A wide crevice separates you from the rest of the cave.

AREA.name: Dark Bend in Cave
AREA.short_description: You are at another bend in the cave.
AREA.long_description: You are at another bend in the cave. The light from the entrance is much dimmer here.

AREA.name: Dark Cave with Ledge
AREA.short_description: You are standing in a dark cave.
AREA.long_description: You are standing in a dark cave. You can barely make out any features. You think the cave continues south.

AREA.name: Narrow Stairway in Cave
AREA.short_description: You are on a dark and narrow stairway in the cave.
AREA.long_description: You are on a dark and narrow stairway in the cave.

AREA.name: Bottom of Cliff in Cave
AREA.short_description: You are at the bottom of a cliff in the cave.
AREA.long_description: You are at the bottom of a cliff in the cave.
